data.title: STUDIO.MOD problem - Liquid Edition Pro 5.5
data.text:
Hi,

There is more than one way of un-installing Liquid Edition, the preferred method is to use the Pinnacle Unwise un-install software located at Ã¢â¬ÅC:\Program Files\Pinnacle\Edition 5Ã¢â¬Â to do this is recommended.

Having un-installed the software run registry cleaning software.

Then re-install the service the service packs.

Try downloading and installing the latest copy of DirectX.

Now try re-installing Liquid Edition.

Jim Bird.
